Posts.Content: Jul 23, 2013 03:58PM Ahicks62 wrote: Im surprised you didnt find out when you woke up. I didnt know what to expect or what exactly would be done, but they biopsied my sentinel node and gave the results to my husband and family while I was still asleep. It sounds like most likely yours will be clear, good luck to you!
Posts.Title: had lumpectomy, waiting for results. going nuts! kika2013 Beesie

Posts.Content: Jul 23, 2013 06:46PM Ahicks62 wrote: I have lymphedema in my treated breast. Its more unusual than in the arms, but not rare. I went through lymphedema therapy and wear a compression bra. The breast is a little sore, and the fluid keeps coming back. I'm not sure what more they can do besides drain the fluid. Hopefully your treaments will help!
Posts.Title: Breast lymphodema NickyJ Ahicks62
